metadata.title: CVE-2013-7267 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.description:
The atalk_recvmsg function in net/appletalk/ddp.c in the Linux kernelbefore 3.12.4 updates a certain length value without ensuring that anassociated data structure has been initialized, which allows local users toobtain sensitive information from kernel memory via a (1) recvfrom, (2)recvmmsg, or (3) recvmsg system call.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-7267` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-3.12.0-7-generic - 3.12.0-7.15
linux-image-3.12.0-7-generic-lpae - 3.12.0-7.15

No subscription required
